title: How does Eminem make his songs? - Quora

He constantly thinks of rhymes and writes them all down as they come to him. He calls this “Stacking Ammo” and he puts these pages with rhymes or “Ammo” (lyrical ammunition) into a box saved for later .Then once he has enough rhymes that flow together and can be in the same song and fit the theme, he threads them together to make an entire song.
